meanings.sent1: The garbage was thrown fetidly into the dumpster.
meanings.sent2: The swamp water smelled fetidly after days of stagnation.
meanings.sent3: The skunk danced fetidly around the garden, spreading its unique perfume.
meanings.sent4: The air hung fetidly with the stench of decay, like a heavy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The room was fetidly filled with the scent of old socks and mold.

meanings.sent1: The fetidly rotten eggs made everyone gag.
meanings.sent2: The dumpster behind the restaurant was always fetidly smelly.
meanings.sent3: The joke was so bad, it left a fetidly awkward atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent4: The fetidly odor of failure clung to the project like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The fetidly aroma of the garbage dump invaded our nostrils, making us cringe.
